EmailTemplate.description: StarTrack Credit Dispute Email Template to inform user for successful completion of claim.
EmailTemplate.name: Successful Completion
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case No.: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear ,
We are pleased to confirm your ticket has been completed.
Please note we have raised a Credit Submission for $ ex GST subject to approval.
The credit amount as shown plus GST will be reflected as an adjustment to your invoice/statement once approved and released to your account.
HANDY TIP: To cancel a consignment that has been manifested, please email your cancelled con note numbers to: connote.deletion@startrack.com.au (NSW / QLD) southwest.deletion@startrack.com.au (VIC / SA / NT / TAS / WA)
Please do this on a daily basis, to ensure deletion/cancellation prior to 3pm every Wednesday.
NOTE: Please be advised you are now able to lodge your credit claim online by completing our credit claim form via https://forms.startrack.com.au/tools/credit-claim.
Regards,
Customer Resolution Team StarTrack
{!Case.Thread_Id}
This email is sent by Star Track Express Pty Limited or one of its related entities (collectively referred to as “STARTRACK”). The information contained in this email is confidential and may contain legally privileged information. Confidentiality and legal privilege are not waived or lost by reason of mistaken delivery. The content of this email is the view or opinion of the stated author and does not necessarily reflect the view or opinion of STARTRACK. If you are not the intended recipient or the person responsible for the delivery of the message to the intended recipient, any dissemination of the information is strictly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please contact the sender by return email and delete the email and any attachments from your computer. Although STARTRACK has taken care to ensure the attachments (if any) to this email are virus free, STARTRACK does not warrant that any such attachments are free of errors, viruses or other malicious codes and does not accept liability for any consequences to the recipient upon opening or using this email.
